title: BUSNESS

author: Jeff F
comment: Doesn't see Chromecast devices

reply.author: Vbio
reply.content: Dear user, I would advice you to select your phone in device selection list and click the Chromecast icon when in video player or music player, wait for sometime and I am sure it will appear, as we never faced that issue. Thanks for understanding...

author: Mike Bird
comment: Video playback keeps pausing for no obvious reason. Uninstalled.

reply.author: Vbio
reply.content:
Dear user, 

Sorry for what you are facing while playing video. But, what you are facing is only possible if you got high traffic on your WiFi connection as you are streaming HD video and that requires full speed of your network. Thus, this is just network issue, nothing else. Thanks for understanding...

title: Keeps pausing

author: Jeff Fecteau
comment: It crashes whenever I choose to stream from my PC. I will rate it higher if it starts to work.

reply.author: Vbio
reply.content:
Dear User,

This is an Android app which works on Android smartphone and tablets. It will not work on your PC. Use on your smartphone and then try to rate the app please.
